Furniture.Name: Elevator
电梯
Furniture.Description: 在不同楼层的顶部放置电梯来连接不同楼层间的房间

Furniture.Name: Table
桌子
Furniture.Description: 可以放置东西，并将椅子放在周围

Furniture.Name: Glass Table
玻璃桌
Furniture.Description: 一边工作一边享受绝佳的双脚观察视角

Furniture.Name: Cheap Chair
便宜的塑料椅
Furniture.Description: 让人难受的便宜塑料椅

Furniture.Name: Office Chair
办公室椅
Furniture.Description: 非常好的支撑椅，虽然没有轮子

Furniture.Name: Couch
沙发
Furniture.Description: 客厅公司 (Living Room Inc.)

Furniture.Name: Small Heater
Small Heater
Furniture.Description: Humble heating unit for your basic office needs

Furniture.Name: Ceiling Fan
Ceiling Fan
Furniture.Description: Nifty ceiling fan, which not only looks cool, but also cools down the room! May cause noise pollution.

Furniture.Name: Radiator
散热器
Furniture.Description: 冬季终结机

Furniture.Name: Ventilation
换气扇
Furniture.Description: 夏季终结机

Furniture.Name: Central Heating
Central Heating
Furniture.Description: Industrial strength central heating unit to heat up entire buildings. Very noisy and very ugly.

Furniture.Name: AC Unit
AC Unit
Furniture.Description: Industrial strength air conditioning unit to cool down entire building complexes. Extremely noisy and ugly, and has to be placed above ground.

Furniture.Name: Old Computer
老式电脑
Furniture.Description: 一只手便能数尽的像素点！

Furniture.Name: Modern Computer
现代电脑
Furniture.Description: 现代电脑来满足你对电脑的一切时尚需求

Furniture.Name: HoloComputer
全息电脑
Furniture.Description: 欢迎来到未来！虽然每一件事都有点不太方便

Furniture.Name: Lamp
灯
Furniture.Description: 确保你的员工可以在工作很晚时有灯光，或者你在布局窗户时遇到了麻烦时可以用灯光

Furniture.Name: Desk Lamp
台灯
Furniture.Description: For localized lighting improvements

Furniture.Name: Floor Lamp
落地灯
Furniture.Description: Makes light, but is also in the way

Furniture.Name: Fridge
冰箱
Furniture.Description: 食物生产机

Furniture.Name: Instant Coffee
速溶咖啡机
Furniture.Description: 你在热水里泡了一些棕色的粉末，我想你现在不会在某些时候感觉发困了吧?

Furniture.Name: Coffee
咖啡机
Furniture.Description: 你的标准咖啡磨粉机

Furniture.Name: Espresso Machine
浓缩咖啡机
Furniture.Description: 通过噪音、大量的水、更多的电量和人力维护来提供高质量咖啡

Furniture.Name: Toilet
厕所
Furniture.Description: 冲水式马桶

Furniture.Name: Painting
油画
Furniture.Description: 用一张老掉牙的画来提升办公室的逼格

Furniture.Name: Bookshelf
书架
Furniture.Description: 读书助你成功

Furniture.Name: Floor Plant
置地盆景
Furniture.Description: 一颗迷人的置地盆景

Furniture.Name: Table Plant
桌上盆栽
Furniture.Description: 低矮的盆栽树

Furniture.Name: Big Plant
大型盆栽
Furniture.Description: 虽然占用了大量空间，但员工们依然因它看起来很棒而接受它

Furniture.Name: Clock
时钟
Furniture.Description: 时间机器!(但并不是指时间guang机器)

Furniture.Name: Small Server
小型服务器
Furniture.Description: 一台普通的电脑，但它可以更好联网

Furniture.Name: Tower Server
塔式服务器
Furniture.Description: 一台高性能的塔(但并不是一座塔)

Furniture.Name: Server Rack
服务器机架
Furniture.Description: 如果一台电脑不够用...

Segment.Name: Sliding glass door
可滑动玻璃门
Segment.Description: 一扇两面都是窗户的门

Segment.Name: Small window
小型窗户
Segment.Description: 如果在房间与房间的间隔墙上放置，它将会毫无用途

Segment.Name: Large window
大型窗户
Segment.Description: 如果你想要一个更大的窗户
